Articles.Content:
Anyone know of a mod that would allow you to change the "science points" cap for each level of the R&D center?

For example, have level 1 go up to 200 instead of 90, and have level 2 go up to 750 instead of 500?

If no such mod exists, any idea where to start in creating a mod to do (only) that?

I think some part of SETI does something like that, but it's just a tiny part of that (hugely enjoyable) mod. I'm reasonably sure any mod that aims to do something like this will be dependent on Custom Barn Kit.

2 minutes ago, VenDei said:

I think some part of SETI does something like that, but it's just a tiny part of that (hugely enjoyable) mod. I'm reasonably sure any mod that aims to do something like this will be dependent on Custom Barn Kit.

Looks like custom barn kit will allow me to do it with a MM patch, thank you
